SEARCH
Package controller

Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
controller.SessionController
controller.PatientController
public class PatientController extends SessionController
Represents the controller for a patient in the medical system. Manages patient-related tasks such as viewing and updating personal information, managing appointments, handling appointment requests, and interacting with the patient view.
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hoo Jing Huan, Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientController

      public PatientController(Patient patient, Scanner scanner)
      Constructs a PatientController with a given patient and scanner for input.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient associated with this controller
      scanner - The scanner for user input

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu()
      Displays the main menu for the patient and handles user input. Includes options for viewing messages, personal information, available slots, and managing appointments.
      Specified by:
      showMenu in class SessionController

    • updatePersonalInfo

      public void updatePersonalInfo()
      Updates the personal information of the patient. Provides options to enter basic info or update contact info.

    • inputDate

      private LocalDate inputDate()
      Prompts the user to input a valid date. Ensures the date is not in the past.
      Returns:
      The input date, or null if invalid

    • updateContactInfo

      public void updateContactInfo()
      Updates the contact information of the patient.

    • sendCancellationMessage

      public static void sendCancellationMessage(Appointment tempApp)
      Sends a cancellation message for a cancelled appointment.
      Parameters:
      tempApp - The cancelled appointment

    • sendRequestMessage

      public static void sendRequestMessage(AppointmentRequest request, boolean rescheduled)
      Sends a request message for an appointment request.
      Parameters:
      request - The appointment request
      rescheduled - True if the request is a reschedule, false otherwise

    • enterBasicInfo

      public void enterBasicInfo()
      Prompts the patient to enter basic information.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public void scheduleAppointment()
      Schedules an appointment for the patient. Prompts the patient to select a doctor and a timeslot.

    • rescheduleAppointments

      public void rescheduleAppointments()
      Reschedules an appointment for the patient. Prompts the patient to select a new date and time for the appointment.

    • getDateAndTime

      private ArrayList<Object> getDateAndTime()
      Helper method to get date and time for scheduling or rescheduling an appointment. Ensures the date and time are valid and not overlapping with existing appointments.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the date and time

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment()
      Cancels an appointment for the patient. Prompts the patient to select an appointment to cancel and updates the status.

    • viewRequests

      public void viewRequests()
      Views the appointment requests made by the patient and allows cancellation of requests.

    • findRequest

      private AppointmentRequest findRequest(ArrayList<AppointmentRequest> requests)
      Finds an appointment request by its ID from a list of requests.
      Parameters:
      requests - The list of appointment requests
      Returns:
      The found appointment request, or null if not found or invalid
